website_summaries.verdict: Sporty athletic pants with a drawstring tie. Nylon outer is great for cool and windy days.
pros: Polyester outer shell for resistance to cold and water
Toddler and elementary-aged sizes and several color choices
cons: Pants make a bit of a "swishing" noise which some kids might not like

customer_reviews.title: The elastic waist in these pants is not nearly tight ...
customer_reviews.text: The elastic waist in these pants is not nearly tight enough for my skinny boy! It has a drawstring, but he doesn't know how to tie it by himself, so that's not really an option. My son is 43 inches tall and 36 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Cerrito Mamma

customer_reviews.title: No stretch, but well made track type pants
customer_reviews.text: These are well made track type pants with windbreaker material and cotton liner. They fit well, but I dock a star for lack of stretch in the material because it's a little tight around the crotch when he's playing around at the park.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: What we expected
customer_reviews.text: The pants are nice and fit as expected. We call them his swish pants since they make a swishing noise when he rubs his legs together. My 9 year old says there comfortable and they have held up well to all his activity.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are cute, water resistant and have a soft (probably cotton or mostly cotton) liner.
customer_reviews.author: Katerina Liedle

customer_reviews.title: Odd fit
customer_reviews.text: The top of these pants are very long. Probably better for a child wearing a diaper than a child in underwear.
customer_reviews.author: CMU

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfect. My 3 year old calls them his "special soccer pants." TOO cute for words!
customer_reviews.author: CJD

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the elastic ankles, my son is short and often I stepping on the heels of pants. These stay in place and are easy on/off for being independent in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Careful
customer_reviews.text: The draw string doesn’t work it’s just for show , the good thing is it has a linear.
customer_reviews.author: sall_ss

customer_reviews.title: Great pants
customer_reviews.text: True to size... They are good quality, not too thick not too thin, and cute. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JStandland1

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: Love these pants, as durable as expected but the fit is just right! The length is also just right so every time we run through a pair (which happens with an active boy), I feel comfortable ordering them again.
customer_reviews.author: Erin G

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, a little big for my son but he is small and that is what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for very thin boy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these pants. My son is very thin and I have not been able to find athletic pants that fit and he doesn’t like jeans. Wish I could get more colors in these exact pants. I tried a similar pair but the waist is too big in the same size
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: recommend
customer_reviews.text: nice, exactly what I was looking for, satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Petra

customer_reviews.title: Great for boys!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 y o son loves these pants. He’s been wearing this brand OSH KOSH and style since he was a toddler!! They are sturdy and wash well. Also warm in the winter time. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Heather B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Great fit. Love that they are lined inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for my son to wear during those cold days and when it rains!!!
customer_reviews.author: Meena

customer_reviews.title: They keep him warm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these pants! They keep him warm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca D

customer_reviews.title: The pants are not as shown or described.
customer_reviews.text: The pants are not as shown or described. They are Not tapered and do not have elastic at the ankles
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great for Potty Training Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: These are nicely lined on the inside with a soft cotton poly blend with a sporty polyester shell. Perfect for playing outside on crisp fall days. There are no zippers or buttons to mess around with so these are also potty training friendly. The drawstrings are functional, not decorative, so if your kid is lean you have that option, though I didn't need it for my boy who is 31 lbs. Overall, these are high quality pants that I've come to expect from Osh Kosh. **If you found this review helpful, please click the thumbs up icon below. Thanks!**
customer_reviews.author: Drug Waitress, RN

customer_reviews.title: runs big
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 9 year old son. Quality wise they are nice. They do run large but this tends to be an issue with a clothing on my son. They do have a drawstring however it doesn't do anything to tighten the waist. My son does like these pants but is embarrassed wearing them to school. He said when he would run around outside he would have to grip the pants otherwise they would slide down his waist exposing his batman briefs. All this said he will keep the pants as he really likes them
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great three season pants
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son is about 36 inches and 33 lbs. These are slightly roomy at the waist, but thanks to the functional drawstring, will stay up with no problem. They're great pants for the autumn season, as they are nicely lined on the inside, but water resistant on the outside. I like the tapered legs to help prevent tripping while running. They're cute, comfortable, size appropriate and great for fall/spring weather or could easily be layered when it gets colder.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Wet Florida Winters
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. They are a bit on the heavy side for typical Florida weather but with winter coming up (and nights and early mornings getting chilly) these will be great. The fit is good. The drawstring pants allow them to accommodate most waist sizes and I like that the bottoms are near the ankles are fitted so the pants don't drag (ruining the pants or posing a tripping risk). Definitely the quality you'd expect from this brand and they look great too.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Great pants
customer_reviews.text: Love these pants. They're a bit large for my son right now, but will be able to wear them next year. These are nicely lined in a jersey material, and the outside is a nylon material. These are perfect for cooler weather. The pants I received are not cinched at the bottom, rather loose, with a zipper along the side. There is a drawstring for tightening the pants. Very pleased with these pants, as my son will get lots of wear from these.
customer_reviews.author: R.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday pants
customer_reviews.text: These are great everyday pants. The outside is a waterproof type material and they have a soft cotton inner liner. Good coverage, but don't seem too hot. They have stood up great to accidents and lots and lots of washes! Got them in a 3t for my son. They are an average fit, comparable to carters and cat and jack sizing. The waist is not a very tight elastic, but they stay on well. Cute too!
customer_reviews.author: RoMama

customer_reviews.title: Super-soft lining
customer_reviews.text: These pants are lined with super-soft material (I would totally wear them just around the house if they came in mommy sizes!), and the outside material is thick enough to withstand daily toddler life but not so thick the pants will be hot. The drawstring is a nice feature too, so you can loosen it as your kid grows (assuming he doesn't outgrow the pants height-wise first lol).
customer_reviews.author: Malleybean

customer_reviews.title: Sporty and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These pants are great for breezy or windy days. The pants have a windbreaker material on the outside with a soft jersey knit lining. They're perfect for playing outside on chilly and windy days. My son likes the pants and they fit him well. He wears 3T and these fit him perfectly. The pants are nice quality and should hold up until he outgrows them.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Furkins' Human

customer_reviews.title: Warm, comfortable pants.
customer_reviews.text: These fit great on my almost 3 year old, the length is just right and the waistband is stretchy but can be tied off to keep the pants on if the child is on the smaller side. The inside is lined with a soft material and the outside is like windbreaker material but feels much sturdier. Good pants for cool fall days.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. ChaCha

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Pants
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these pants. They are lined in jersey cotton material, so they are really soft on the inside. The outside is loud nylon material. They have an elastic waist band and a drawstring. They are really comfortable. They are durable. They also have zippers on the ankles to unzip over boots or bigger shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Jane

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, drawstring keeps them wearable earlier/longer. Lining is good and warm for cooler outside play. A little bit loud/swishy. They actually seem to get less dirty in the yard because the lining allows some give when they slide instead of smearing grass/dirt.
customer_reviews.author: owookiee

customer_reviews.title: Great playwear
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for cool weather playwear! They are lined with a high quality fleece material, and have a slick nylon outer shell. The ankle elastic is great for keeping little legs warm from drafty weather. Drawstring keeps them on slimmer little guys. These are made to be strong and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Smartly Created

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pants!
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent pants. They fit great on my (short) seven year old, and he says they are nice and comfortable. Quality is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Osprey

customer_reviews.title: Pants were great but needed to return and only got a small ...
customer_reviews.text: Pants were great but needed to return and only got a small portion back. Restocking fee. VERY DISAPPOINTED OSHKOSH BIGOSH
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality, kids love them
customer_reviews.text: This are great! Well made, lined and soft. Not ideal for hot weather but perfect for fall and winter. We'll probably order a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

product_meta.title: Osh Kosh Boys' Classic Fit Matte Active Pant
product_meta.description: Oshkosh heritage active pants with embroidered 95 Oshkosh pocket art features pieced knees, functional pockets and drawstring, and applied side stripes.
feature_bullets: Active pants with jersey lining, covered elastic waistband and logo label detail
